links.title: Hewlett-Packard (HPQ) to Likely Sell Stake in China Data Networking Business
links.description: NEW YORK ( TheStreet) -- Hewlett-Packard Co. has reportedly agreed to sell a controlling 51% stake in its China-based data networking business, which is estimated to be worth over $2 billion, Reuters reports. HP, which is a global provider of products, technologies, software, solutions, and services to a variety of customers, is said to be selling the stake to the Chinese private equity fund Tsinghua Unigroup.
